transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ah, sollunga sir. Good afternoon sir. IndiaMART-ndu call pannirukken sir. Back end team-nnu kekkuringala?
Customer: Ah, sollunga sollunga sir.
Executive: Ah, kekkuthu sir, kekkuthu. Sollunga sollunga.
Customer: Sollunga sir. Account manager vanduttu profile share pannirundharu. Indha maari buyleads show kammiya irukkundha maari update pannirundhingala idhai?
Customer: Buyleads kammi illa. Buyleads munnadi varamaatte sir adhu.
Executive: Seri sir. So, adhu regarding-aa dhaan share panni irundhaaru. Ellaam other state-od-dhaan. Ellaam other state-od leads dhaan sir enakku. Enna doubt-naa oru three to four months munnadi correct-aa irundhadhu adhu. Ippo account manager maarinna approm dhaan vandhu suththamaa enakkku varave maattudhu enakku adhu.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: Munnadi ellaam edho North Indian dhaan inga avanga konjam okay-aa correct-aa ellaame vandhu dhaan irundhadhu adhu. Neenga adhu mela reason-aa illa enna reason-nu enakku kekka kooda theriyala adhu.
Executive: Seri appadi irukkaadhu sir. Account manager ippo ungaludaiya idhukkaaga dhaan paathinga naama change pannangale. Tamil person-aa irundhaa ungalukku convenient-aa irukkunnu sollittu dhaan adhu vandhuttu changes aanadhu.
Customer: Illa appo ellaam suththamaa varamaatte sir leads adhu. Idhukku munnadi nalla irundhu sir. Unmaiyaave serious-aa nalla irundhadhu adhu.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Neenga eppo solluringa? Oru six months munnadiyaa illa eppadi solluringa?
Customer: Sir oru last oru four months kitta appadi dhaan sir irukkaadhu. Oru lead edho oru lead varunnaa kooda adhu vandhu ithu was expired. Orea two minutes full-aa andha lead expired-nu solli sila time varudhu. Adhu melaam paaththave illa. Leads ellaam indha maari indha maari kaattudhu indrappe. Ippodhaan oru few days indha maari varudhu. Sila leads ellaam mela show aagudhu. Notice section varudhu. Ulla poi paaththaa adhum sold-nu varudhu. Adhum within oru ten minutes-kulla adhu sold-nu varudhu.
Executive: Seri adhu vandhu account manager side-la adhu adhu vandhuttu account manager side-la default kidaiyaadhu. So, ippo namma side-la ippo sale namma construction related-aa paathinga nariya customers vandhuttu onboard aayirukkunaala paathinga so andha idaththula competition-nguradhu konjam adhigamaa irukku. So, adhanaala vandhuttu most-aa seekiramaa ungalukku sold out aaguradhu-nnu irukku. So, idhai naan vandhuttu ungalukku rectify panni kodukkaren.
Customer: Ten minutes-la sold aayirumaa sir adhu?
Executive: Sir ten minutes-la five minutes-la kooda sold out aagurathukku chances irukku sir. First irukkura naalu anju suppliers-kku mattum dhaan paathinga andha buyleads-nguradhu show aagum. So, adhu within seconds-la edutthaanganna kooda paathinga adhu ungalukku sold out-nnu dhaan show aagum sir. Adhu ten minutes-nnu kidaiyaadhu. Neenga notification enable panni vachirukkeengalaa mobile app-la?
Customer: Suththamaa onnume varamaatte sir enakku. Naama romba nariya consume pannirundhen enakku. Enna-nnu theriyala enakku adhu. Enga dhaan prachchanai onnume puriyala enakku.
Executive: Illa illa naan naan adhu ungalukku oru some some tools ellaame naan ungalukku solren adhu mattum regular-aa neenga follow pannunga. Idhu account manager-aala andha default kidaiyaadhu. Idhu buyleads vandhuttu buyer-oda idhu dhaan. Buyer-kku requirement irundhaa post pannaa dhaan andha idaththula ungalukku receive aagum. Ippo indha month full-aa andha categories-la edhume buyers side-la irundhu post aagala appidinaa andha month ungalukku still zero dhaan adhu. Based on andha market-oda value poruththu dhaan ungalukku adhu. Okay-ngalaa? Idhai naan ungalukku sort out panni kodukkaren.
Customer: Ippo Coimbatore-la vandhuttu oru six minutes munnadi oru buyleads post aayirukku check pannni paathingalaa?
Executive: Sir unmaiyaave naan unmaiyaa ippo konja neram munnadi oru leads vandhu ippo oru lead vandhu edutthen naan. Andha leads paathinga edho North Indian pesuraan.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Tamil Nadu leads dhaan. Sivakasi leads dhaan. Neenga kooda paarunga ippo konja neram mattum dhaan edutthu oru half an hour mattum dhaan eduththiruppennu ninaikkiren. Edho North Indian pesuraan avan. Innumae sila nariya leads vandhu nariya leads-la oru oru 10% 50% kitta vandhu oru 20% oru ellaam moththamaa vandhu ippadi ippadiyum varudhu. Sila vandhu expired-nu varudhu. Sila vandhu number-ae wrong number indha maari North Indian pesura maari varudhu. Ellaam vandhu other state-oda leads full-aa irukku. But aanaa Tamil Nadu range-kulla adhu vara maari irukku adhu.
Executive: Seri appadi illa. Enna ippo namma Tamil Nadu locations-layume North Indians nariya per irukkaangale sir. Maybe andha avanga lead panna avanga andha state-ae illa sir avanga. Avanga idaththa kekkaren avanga andha state-ae illaindraanga adhu.
Executive: Okay. Ippo last-aa innikki eduththirukka buyleads-ngalaa? November three-la eduttheengale adhungalaa sir?
Customer: Ippo konja neram mattum dhaan oru lead onnu edutthen naan. Neengale paarunga.
Executive: Aah yes sir. Eduththirukkeenga. So, naan andha lead vandhu naan recheck panren adhu. So, adhu enna vandhuttu default-nu solli naan adhu naan check panni paakkaren. So, neenga vandhuttu andha past leads already inform panniruppaangale. Unga account manager side-la irundhu inform panniruppaangale?
Customer: Aama aama sir. Idhukku munnadi sold out aana buyleads. Seri adhu mattum neenga.
Executive: Illa illa sir neenga koduththirukkeenga illainnu solla. Adhai vandhuttu neenga continue-aa neenga ellaame try panni paaththirundhen sir adhu suththamaa work-ae aaga maatte sir adhu. Enakku potta money-yum vandhu edukka mudiyaadhu enakku kitta kooda theriyudhu enakku.
Executive: Seri appadi illa appadi negative aagaadhinga. Idhu kandippaa ungalukku work out aagum. Neenga daily andha buyleads eppadi irukkeengalo.
Customer: Daily daily dhaan ellaa hero-vum pay panni dhaan irukken naan. Idhukku approm enakku suththamaa enakku idhu venumaa vendha alavukku enakku oru maari thing thing-aa irukku enakku adhu.
Executive: Seri illa appadi negative-aa pogavenaam sir namma ippo. So, idhukku mela naan ungalukku support panren enakku direct-aa direct-aa share pannirukkaanga. Kandippaa naan ungalukku change panni kodukkaren idhula. Neenga vandhuttu unga side-la irundhe kodukkaanum input mattum naan solren adhu mattum neenga idhu pannunga. Yaenaa neenga koduttheenga appinaa dhaan ennaala vandhuttu inga vandhuttu work panna mudiyum. So, adhu illaama innoru vishayam sir oru chinna suggestion mattum. So, ippo 96 indha maari call pannningale. So, andha maari vandhuttu direct-aa vandhuttu avangalukku idhu pannaadhinga neenga direct-aa account manager-kku inform pannunga. Ungalukku result varala sir enakku. Naan ungalukku executive-kku eppadi paaththaa oru ten times mela andha month month solli dhaan sir irukken. One week paakkalaam-nnu irukkeenga one month paakkalaam-nnu irukkeenga appo suththamaa varave maattudhu adhu.
Executive: Illa sir idhu idhai naan sonnen appidinaa ippo 96 neenga customer care call pannninga appinaalume actually andha account manager-kku dhaan paathinga redirect aayittu varum. So, neenga inform pannadhu-kku approm-aetu account manager avanga idhu pannadhu-kku approm-aetu dhaan engalukku vandhuttu share aagum. So, adhukku approm avurdhaan vandhuttu ungalukku rectify pannuvaaru. Yaenaa unga profiles ellaame paathinga avurdhaan handle panraaru. So, adhanaala avarukku dhaan adhukku approm varum. Idhula innoru default enna appidinnu paathinga profile-la vandhuttu oru maari condense size aayitte irukkum. So, indha maari oru oru default-aa vandhuttu change aagum indha maari rendu moonu time naama pannirukkom appindradhu maari profile vandhuttu default-aa irukkavum andha default-la dhaan paathinga avanga vandhuttu work pannuvaanga back end team paathinga work pannuvaanga. So, namma profile-la andha lead generate panradhukku location-kku indha maari sila paathinga adhigam work panna mudiyaadhu.
Customer: Hello. Seri okay sir konjam veliye vandhirukken naan. Naan ungalukku evening illa naalikki morning call panren. Enna enna pannanum sollunga tips ellaam enakkku konjam pannikkaattunga.
Executive: Okay sir. So, ippo ippo indha close pannikkalaangalaa sir? Idhai eduththirundhaa dhaan naama work panna mudiyum so adhukkaaga dhaan. Naan ungalukku morning kooda naan ungalukku call panni andha tips ellaame solren neenga follow pannunga. Ippo panninaa side-kku naan work out panna start panni vachirukken seri-ngalaa?
Customer: Seri okay sir okay sir. So, orea oru mail mattum ungalukku vandhu naan close panna orea oru mail mattum oru oru feedback mattum. So, adhu mattum konjam check panni koduththirunga sir seri-ngalaa?
Customer: Seri-ngu sir solve panni koduththirunga sir. Enakku solve-ae aagala sir enakku adhu.
Executive: Illa adhaan sir idhu sort out close pannom appinaa dhaan ungalukku vandhuttu work-ae panna mudiyum so adhukkaaga dhaan kekkaren. Adhukkaaga dhaan ippo.
Customer: Seri okay okay sir.
Executive: Seri okay. Okay sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyleads not generating properly.

- Leads showing as sold within 10 minutes.

- Receiving leads from other states.

- Unable to get back invested money.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to rectify the issue.

- Executive will share tips to improve leads.

- Executive will recheck the leads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer next morning.

- Customer to provide feedback via email.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, refund, account manager
